revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=2Wire |model=2700 |revision=HG-B |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/19/2006 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PGR2W2700RD |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=2Wire |cpu1_model=Perseus;3000-000262-002;EC575503C-1L-1E; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=NAND128W3A2BN6 |fla1_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS16M16CS-5T |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6996M |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=2WIREXXX |default_ssid_regex=^2WIRE[0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:18:3F |oui_eth=00:18:3F |default_ch= }} [http://hackingbtbusinesshub.wordpress.com/2011/09/02/pcb-photo-of-2wire-3800hgv-b-perseus-vliw-cpu/ PCB photo of 2Wire 2700HG-B (Perseus VLIW CPU) - Hacking the 2Wire]
The default SSID is '''2WIRE''' followed by the last three digits of the serial number.
The power adapter included with the device is a '''2Wire''' 1000-500031-000 / GPUSW0512000GD1S (5.1V, 2A).
